item.description: Hearts is a good game because there is a lot of strategy, but... a lot of luck! Spades is fun because it involves estimating how the cards will fall. We'll play one or both depending on the number of people and tables. Let us know if you prefer getting underway earlier.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the card players, or ask the host.

group.name: The Arlington Hearts & Spades Meetup Group

item.name: Hearts & Spades
